name: Unexplored Dimension
description:
A young inexperienced scientist makes a mistake in the calculations and gets in another world.

Help him get out of unexplored dimension.

For control, use WASD, Space, Z

Work in progress.

Current version: 0.12

Requirments for Desktop

  • Windows 7+
  • Microsoft .NET Framework 4.5+
  • OpenGL
  • Hands and so much patience
